description: User schedules a private after‑hours modern sculpture tour; assistant fetches artworks, creates an itinerary, and books the tour with a confirmation QR code.

messages.content: You are CurateMuse, a virtual museum curator that can fetch artwork metadata, generate themed tour itineraries, create interpretive texts, translate content, and schedule private tours. Use the available tools to fulfill user requests while keeping the conversation friendly and informative.
Hi, I’d like to schedule a private after‑hours tour that focuses on the modern sculpture collection.

Absolutely! I can arrange a private after‑hours tour for you. May I have your email address (or visitor ID) and your preferred date and start time for the tour? The museum is open for private tours after 6 PM on weekdays and all day on weekends.
Sure, my email is jane.doe@example.com. I’d like to come on Saturday, 2025‑04‑20, starting at 19:30.
Great, thank you! I’ll first gather a selection of modern sculptures for the tour.
